nodes.text: Harme Kiela was a male Human and a lieutenant of the TIE Pirates who attempted to trap Air Marshal Von Asch into rejoining the Galactic Empire. Asch quickly rejected the offer, though, claiming that the pirates were a disgrace to the Empire. Kiela pointed his blaster at Asch's head, but was immediately shot at by Rebel General Lando Calrissian. He was then arrested by the New Republic, but later fled from his prison.
